meanings.definition: Relating to Lent, the period of fasting and penitence observed by Christians before Easter.
meanings.sent1: During the lenten season, many people give up certain foods as a form of sacrifice.
meanings.sent2: The lenten services at the church were solemn and reflective.
meanings.sent3: Sarah joked that her lenten diet consisted of only water and air.
meanings.sent4: The lenten atmosphere in the church was as heavy as the weight of their prayers.
meanings.sent5: The lenten traditions helped the community come together in spiritual reflection.

meanings.definition: Simple, plain, or unadorned in style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: She preferred a lenten wardrobe of basic colors and minimal patterns.
meanings.sent2: The room had a lenten decor with clean lines and neutral tones.
meanings.sent3: His lenten taste in art leaned towards minimalist sculptures.
meanings.sent4: The lenten design of the building emphasized functionality over extravagance.
meanings.sent5: The lenten furnishings created a sense of calm and order in the room.
